Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute near Cicero/Rice
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Augusta, Laramie, Chicago and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/Rice.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Augusta, Laramie, Chicago and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/Rice.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound Reroute near 71st/Clyde
ShortDescription: NB 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 73rd, Dorchester, and 71st due to, street blockage near 71st/Clyde.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 73rd, Dorchester, and 71st due to, street blockage near 71st/Clyde.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green and Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green and Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier rpt of a minor fire at track level near Roosevelt. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green and Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier report of a minor fire at track level near Roosevelt.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
